outputs.name: horiz_pipe
outputs.description:
A HorizontalPipeParameter object that can be plugged into the "DF GHE 
Thermal Loop" component to customize the properties of horizonal pipes
in a District Energy System (DES) simulation.

inputs.name: _buried_depth_
inputs.description:
The buried depth of the pipes in Rhino model units (eg. Meters,
Feet, etc.). (Default: 1.5 meters).

inputs.name: _diameter_ratio_
inputs.description:
A number for the ratio of pipe outer diameter to pipe
wall thickness. (Default: 11).

inputs.name: _pressure_drop_
inputs.description: A number for the pressure drop in pascals per meter of pipe. (Default: 300).

inputs.name: _insulation_conduct_
inputs.description:
A positive number for the conductivity of the pipe insulation
material in W/m-K. If no insulation exists, this value should be a
virtual insulation layer of soil since this value must be greater
than zero. (Default: 3.0).

inputs.name: _insulation_thick_
inputs.description:
A positive number for the thickness of pipe insulation in
Rhino model units (eg. Meters, Feet, etc.). If no insulation exists,
this value should be a virtual insulation layer of soil since this
value must be greater than zero. (Default: 0.2 meters).

inputs.name: hydraulic_diameter_
inputs.description:
A number to specify the size of the hydraulic diameter
in meters. If unspecified, the hydraulic diameter will be autosized.

inputs.name: pump_head_
inputs.description:
A number for the design pressure of the ambient loop pump in Pa.
If unspecified, the pump pressure will be autosized.

inputs.name: pump_flow_
inputs.description:
A number for the design volume flow rate of the ambient loop pump
in m3/s. If unspecified, the pump flow rate will be autosized.

code:
try:
    from dragonfly_energy.des.connector import HorizontalPipeParameter
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import dragonfly_energy:\n\t{}'.format(e))
try:
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.config import conversion_to_meters
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))
try:
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import turn_off_old_tag
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))
turn_off_old_tag(ghenv.Component)


buried_depth = _buried_depth_ * conversion_to_meters() \
    if _buried_depth_ is not None else 1.5
insulation_thickness = _insulation_thick_ * conversion_to_meters() \
    if _insulation_thick_ is not None else 0.2
diameter_ratio = _diameter_ratio_ if _diameter_ratio_ is not None else 11
pressure_drop_per_meter = _pressure_drop_ if _pressure_drop_ is not None else 300
insulation_conductivity = _insulation_conduct_ if _insulation_conduct_ is not None else 3.0


horiz_pipe = HorizontalPipeParameter(
    buried_depth=buried_depth, diameter_ratio=diameter_ratio,
    pressure_drop_per_meter=pressure_drop_per_meter,
    insulation_conductivity=insulation_conductivity,
    insulation_thickness=insulation_thickness,
    hydraulic_diameter=hydraulic_diameter_,
    pump_design_head=pump_head_,
    pump_flow_rate=pump_flow_
)
name: DF Horizontal Pipe Parameter
description:
Create a HorizontalPipeParameter object that can be used to customize the properties
of horizontal pipes contained within ThermalConnectors.
_
The output of this component can be used with the "DF GHE Thermal Loop" component.
-
